issue.title: The use of integer-from<Bytes> all over [simd] is incorrect for Bytes=sizeof(complex<double>)

discussion.p: After the introduction of complex<double> to the set of vectorizable types, the integer-from<Bytes> trait does not work as intended anymore. All uses of integer-from need to be reviewed and the wording needs to be adjusted to work for Bytes=16.
Set priority to 1 after reflector poll.
